items.name: Contributing Sensors With Local Tracknumbers
items.comment: List of Sensors contributing to the system track and providing a local track-number

items.name: SAC
items.comment: SAC of the sensor contributing to the track in the current update cycle.

items.name: SIC
items.comment: SIC of the sensor contributing to the track in the current update cycle.

items.name: TYP
items.comment:
0: No detection
1: Single PSR detection
2: Single SSR detection
3: SSR+PSR detection
4: Single Mode S All-Call
5: Single Mode S Roll-Call
6: Mode S All-Call + PSR
7: Mode S Roll-Call + PSR
8: ADS-B
9: WAM
Others: Reserved for future use

items.name: LOCAL TRACK NUMBER
items.comment: local Track Number allocated by the sensor denominated by SAC/SIC

items.name: Contributing Sensors No Local Tracknumbers
items.comment: List of Sensors contributing to the system track and not providing a local track-number

items.name: SAC
items.comment: SAC of the sensor contributing to the track in the current update cycle.

items.name: SIC
items.comment: SIC of the sensor contributing to the track in the current update cycle.

items.name: TYP
items.comment:
0: No detection
1: Single PSR detection
2: Single SSR detection
3: SSR+PSR detection
4: Single Mode S All-Call
5: Single Mode S Roll-Call
6: Mode S All-Call + PSR
7: Mode S Roll-Call + PSR
8: ADS-B
9: WAM
Others: Reserved for future use

items.name: Calculated Track Velocity Relative to System Reference Point
items.comment: Calculated track velocity expressed in Cartesian co-ordinates relative to the system reference point, in twoâ€™s complement form.

items.name: Ground Velocity Accuracy
items.comment: Accuracy of the Ground Speed and Track Angle elements of Ground Velocity Vector.

data_fields.name: GSSD
data_fields.comment: IStandard deviation of the Ground Speed

data_fields.name: TASD
data_fields.comment: Standard deviation of the Track Angle

items.name: Time of ASTERIX Report Transmission
items.comment: Time of the transmission of the ASTERIX category 020 report in the form of elapsed time since last midnight, expressed as UTC.

items.name: FDR
items.comment:
Flight Data Retained
0: Flight plan data from active FDPS
1: Flight plan data retained from no longer active FDPS
